name: kindle sleeve
sizes_available: fits an 11th gen paperwhite kindle (7.25 x 5.25)
notes:
* final dimensions: ~7.25in x 5.25in
* this project is written in us terminology
* you will be using the alpine stitch. this stitch is
made by alternating dc and fpdc.
* you will be joining at the end of each round
*ch 2 at the beginning of each round does not
count as a dc
* this sleeve will fit a kindle paperwhite (the
one pictured is a 11th gen)

skills required: basic knowledge of crochet, basic sewing skills

project materials
yarn: worsted weight (55g) i used red heart
super saver
5.00 mm hook
stitch markers
20mm button
tapestry needle
scissors

stitch abbreviations
ch- chain
slst- slip stitch
sc- single crochet
dc- double crochet
fpdc- front post double crochet
st- stitch
fo- finish off
